targets.rawSql: SELECT churn_rate AS "Churn Rate %" FROM warehouse.churn_insights WHERE insight_name = 'overall_summary' AND data_source = 'csv' LIMIT 1;
SELECT total_customers AS "Total Customers" FROM warehouse.churn_insights WHERE insight_name = 'overall_summary' AND data_source = 'csv' LIMIT 1;
SELECT churned_customers AS "Churned" FROM warehouse.churn_insights WHERE insight_name = 'overall_summary' AND data_source = 'csv' LIMIT 1;
SELECT avg_monthly_charges AS "Avg Monthly $" FROM warehouse.churn_insights WHERE insight_name = 'overall_summary' AND data_source = 'csv' LIMIT 1;

SELECT category AS "Contract", churn_rate AS "Churn Rate %", total_customers AS "Customers" FROM warehouse.churn_insights WHERE insight_name = 'churn_by_contract' AND data_source = 'csv' ORDER BY churn_rate DESC;

SELECT category AS "Internet", churn_rate AS "Churn Rate %", total_customers AS "Customers" FROM warehouse.churn_insights WHERE insight_name = 'churn_by_internet' AND data_source = 'csv' ORDER BY churn_rate DESC;

SELECT category AS "Payment", churn_rate AS "Churn Rate %", total_customers AS "Customers" FROM warehouse.churn_insights WHERE insight_name = 'churn_by_payment' AND data_source = 'csv' ORDER BY churn_rate DESC;

SELECT category AS "Tenure", churn_rate AS "Churn Rate %", total_customers AS "Customers" FROM warehouse.churn_insights WHERE insight_name = 'churn_by_tenure_group' AND data_source = 'csv' ORDER BY category;
SELECT category AS "Gender", churned_customers AS "Churned" FROM warehouse.churn_insights WHERE insight_name = 'churn_by_gender' AND data_source = 'csv';
SELECT category AS "Type", churn_rate AS "Churn Rate %", total_customers AS "Customers" FROM warehouse.churn_insights WHERE insight_name = 'churn_by_senior' AND data_source = 'csv';

SELECT category AS "Charges", churn_rate AS "Churn Rate %", total_customers AS "Customers" FROM warehouse.churn_insights WHERE insight_name = 'churn_by_charges_group' AND data_source = 'csv' ORDER BY category;

SELECT insight_name, dimension, category, total_customers, churned_customers, churn_rate, avg_monthly_charges, avg_tenure, avg_total_charges, data_source FROM warehouse.churn_insights ORDER BY insight_name, category;
